text:
using jakarta-taglibs-mailer-20011205.zip, I get the following error message:

javax.servlet.ServletException: Since tag handler class 
org.apache.taglibs.mailer.MailTag implements BodyTag, it can't return 
Tag.EVAL_BODY_INCLUDE
creator: Ignaz.Kohlbecker@aperto.de
rich@more.net
text: This was fixed yesterday get the latest version
